TopicTitle: My name is 'away', and I'm a launch-aholic.

Articles.Content:
Greetings all! I discovered KSP due to a random comment on Reddit a few days ago, and after 10 minutes, had to pre-order. Not much to say about myself other than when I was in the Air Force, my job was to spy on Russian road-mobile ICBMs. Rockets are awesome, and I've quickly become hooked on KSP. I look forward to the future of this community!

I'm pretty rusty when it comes to modeling and texturing, but my newest hobby is music, so if you want some free soundtrack work, give me a shout!

And now I shall return to my attempt to put Mun in orbit, and hopefully break 25km in my dual BFE-5000 rig...

Here's my new favorite project, I call it the Noisy Cricket. Jeb just calls it Sir.

3x EV with plenty o' fuel left

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
